case_address_found_1: Banning Coal Landing Area, 17 miles east of Price
case_circumstances: A moderately decomposed male was found at the bottom of a coal car. On 09.09.1978 the coal car had been in Grand Island, Nebraska. The train then traveled through Salt Lake City, Provo, and Helper before arriving to rural Carbon county on 09.18.1978. Property found on the decedent suggests he may have been in Lincoln, Nebraska and Wichita, Kansas.
case_eyewear:
Prescription eyeglasses.
Eyeglass case with B Botions Sullivan Union National Building Wichita, Kansas written on it.
case_other_items_with_body:
Backpack.
Bottle of lotion with the name Byron Ditton on it.
Book of matches from County Steel Liquor Store in Lincoln, Nebraska.
Book of matches from Westgate Bank in Lincoln Nebraska.
Empty vodka bottle from Utah State Liquor Store.
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
